edited_stories.edited_story_text: The city is so beautiful when it snows. On this particular Winter day, snow had covered the ground.  There was a lot of snow on the streets.  The streets were almost impassable, so it was safe to play on the road.  We made memories that we will never forget.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: This is the view outside the building. There was snow covering everything. There was even a lot of snow on the streets. People were shoveling to try and clear the roads, while others were simply having fun.
